website_summaries.verdict: These CrossFit gloves are designed to keep your hands dry and prevent calluses.
pros: Designed with adjustable wrist wraps that simultaneously increase comfort and reduce hand tension
Neoprene construction limits the risk of sweat
Silicone-padded palms help you maintain a steady, comfortable grip at all times
cons: Gloves may stretch over time and are less durable than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: No Palm Tears!
customer_reviews.text: I do high intensity interval training and bought these specifically for hanging moves (monkey bars, pull-ups, etc) so I would rip the palm of my hand. THEY WORK GREAT! I had better grip and no tears and a bonus is they give you more hand strength, so much that I was able to do my first set of unassisted pull-ups. I suggested them to a friend who bought and liked them too. Only downside is they are a little tight on a few fingers, but if I bought a bigger size it would be too loose overall. But not that big of a deal. I'm 6'2" and have size Large- otherwise they are just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves because I do Crossfit and my hands kept ripping open from pull ups. So I decided to look for some gloves to help me out. I purchased these profitness CrossFit gloves and I have been Loving them so far. They completely do the job, they feel great on my hands and also they have helped with my skin rips and calluses. The wrist wrap is great as well, gives great support on those pull ups. Going to purchase one for my girlfriend as well as she’s also just started getting into crossfit. Highly recommend these cross training gloves. 5 Stars for this Awesome workout gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect workout gloves
customer_reviews.text: i have sensitive palms and it really hurts whenever i lift any weights that have a metal bar (because they usually have little spikes for grip). i also really don't like getting calluses so wearing gloves for me is a must. these are perfect because they don't cover your entire hands in case you swell up or simply get very warm while exercising. they get a little looser over time and i find that they fit my hands even better than when they were brand new. the part that goes on the palm isn't too thick and i can still have a great grip/feel what im gripping (if that makes sense). would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Leane

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had!
customer_reviews.text: My original purchase was about 16 months ago. After weekly use they finally ran out of grip. I just bought my second pair and still as good as the original. Find that these are great for any crossfit workouts that involve pullups, toes to bar, and dumbell/barbell work. Besides grips, the wrist support is what puts these over other gloves for me. I registered my second pair for the warranty and was offered some free non grip wrist wraps for doing so which was awesome. Overall.. Beyond happy and will be checking out this brands other items.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for lifting
customer_reviews.text: These training gloves are awesome. They make lifting much more comfortable while also reducing the risk of injury. I ordered the medium and they fit perfectly. The gloves are comfortable to wear and prevent annoying blisters. When wearing, I feel more sturdy while lifting weights and bars since there is a grip on the palm.
customer_reviews.author: B Larson

customer_reviews.title: Cut, material, and quality different from 1 year ago.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these same gloves a year ago in the same size and they’re totally different now!! Longer and tougher! I even ordered a size down and they’re still really long. Sad :( I was going to just replace them because mine are a year old and worn out but I will stitch my old ones back up and look for another pair. So uncomfortable. The finger holes sit at almost my second knuckle. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarak

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to full gloves
customer_reviews.text: I'm still on the fence with these gloves. My full gloves are more comfortable overall but the added padding they provide makes it difficult to wrap my fingers around the weights. These gloves eliminate that problem but I sometimes feel it pulling around my fingers if I have the wrist strap too snug. It takes several adjustments to get it so the hand/fingers don't pinch and my wrist is supported. Haven't had them long enough to really rate durability so the 4 stars is based on how well they appear to be made.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for crossfit and have found them to be very comfortable for that purpose. I can hang from the bar without any pain and the other exercises with weights are great. The proper fit means that there's very little movement of the gloves during the exercises causing no friction on my palms. The rubber part of the glove is sticky enough to maintain grip but not so sticky to cause issues. The gloves are easy enough to put on and take off. Having the back and thumbs be free helps in being able to adjust my grip as appropriate and makes the hans overall not as sweaty. Definitely recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: ABMass

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for Cross fit 5x weekly for the past few months. They were immediately comfortable, work well to protect against calluses, , and are very durable.They are just about broken in, but they are still a little stiffer than I'd like. I use chalk with them for pull ups goes 2 bar, etc. They came with a card for a free pair of knee sleeves which I am wild about. And I received a second pair of gloves as well. None of this was contingent upon a review. What a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: MhitesmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'll preface this by saying that I am by no means an athlete or professional. I bought these for my in-home workouts. I ordered sz small. They are not comfortable between my fingers. They were not too tight by any means. At the end of my first workout, I had calluses on my hands. That defeated the whole purpose. I really wanted to like these but I will be returning. Will have to stick with my very old Nike ones.
customer_reviews.author: hotchips99

customer_reviews.title: Great product, best I’ve used,
customer_reviews.text: The fit of these gloves is spot on. Very soft breathable material. Snug, but not super tight and easy to remove. The wrist straps are very supportive. I use these for weight training five days a week. The grip is great and the gloves do not bunch up when grabbing bars like traditional gloves do. If you are using traditional gloves or fingerless gloves for weight training, I highly recommend you switch to these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable well made gloves
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to using gloves for lifting weights, but I like the way that these gloves feel and fit! They’re made out of neoprene and also support your wrists (you can control how tight). They’re easy to put on and don’t need to be stretched out before use. They seem to be made of quality material and even come with a lifetime replacement guarantee if you register them on their website (super fast and easy to do). They also come in nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: airborne82girly

customer_reviews.title: I Love these Lifting Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a new pair of weight lifting gloves. I was specifically looking for something that doesn’t cover my entire hands. I also wanted something that’s more breathable because my hands tend to sweat a lot making it difficult to have a good grip. I’m so pleased and very happy that I purchased “Profitness Non-Slip Palm Silicone Weight Lifting Gloves”. They’re very comfortable, breathable and makes lifting less painful on my hands. I love it so much and plan on looking for more products from Profitness. Also, they’re customer service is superb! They respond quickly and they go above and beyond for product and customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: mimi04

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect. I just started with a personal trainer a couple of months ago and never knew I’d really need to get anything like this.. but the time came for blisters and I immediately looked into getting a pair of gloves. I have small hands and I got the small gloves which fit perfectly and are easy to get on and off and helped IMMENSELY with protection against the hard metal of weights and the like. The improved my grip and made the experience far less miserable.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna K.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but great.
customer_reviews.text: This glove work not very well with thick barbell, with thick barbell I find myself really hard to lift especially during deadlift session, otherwise pretty great product for normal use and great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kiet Tran

customer_reviews.title: Feels a bit short
customer_reviews.text: The package directly containing the gloves was torn but thankfully the gloves were intact. However I felt like the medium fell a bit short so that when I stretch out my hand there is some discomfort between the middle and ring fingers....as if I needed a large. The wrist wrap basically started at the very end of my palm with a completely outstretched hand so that I have to bend my hand for the wrap to be in the right place. I bought a similar glove (same style) but from Mava and the medium was just fine. I feel like the gloves need to be longer because the large may end up being too big around the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Time Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We all know the gym "pros" love to show off their callus', however, I don't. This is the second time i've purchased these workout gloves because of how comfortable, durable and well they work. I prefer the Profitness glove since it secures my wrist and offers my inner hand protection from the rippin' and the tearin'. Anyways, if you want to protect your hands with a great gloves buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I'm a trainer and have various different gloves for different things. I needed general fitness glove for my cross training workouts. I like the fact that the thumb is free because I found that feature bothersome once I started lifting heavier. The airflow is great. So far they've held up for pulling exercises on the cable column, dumbbell workouts, and various bar workouts. I honestly didn't expect them to hold up because the grip feels less than my other gloves but they work well. The rower is fine if you stick to general rowing. Once I started doing different strokes the gloves got in my way a little. Other than that, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding company
customer_reviews.text: A truly outstanding company. Fantastic pricing with an unbeatable lifetime warranty AND the most attentive customer service I have ever seen. These gloves are really well designed, very comfortable, and stylish as well. i am already recommending them to all of my friends at the gym, and so far they have all been just as equally impressed as myself. Thanks for providing such a wonderful product and for taking such great care of your customers. Your are miles above and beyond all the competition!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE customer service, EXCELLENT gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I bought mostly for grip while doing deadlifts, shrugs, etc. LOVE that they have built in wrist wraps. Helps sooo much for those heavy sets. Also, I used for about 6 months before they started to get worn down and ripping apart, and the company honors the warranty and replaces for no charge !! Incredible customer service, will gladly buy from them again, and keep using products they offer! A++ on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tenny Geldbaugh

customer_reviews.title: can't bend my fingers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different gloves to try. The biggest difference in the 2 is that I can't bend my fingers in this glove. The other glove hinders bending as well, but not as much. I'm not a weight lifter and so my opinion isn't expert but once I put these gloves on, gripping the weights was harder for me. I have small hands. Someone with longer fingers might do better in these. I gave them 4 stars because there's nothing wrong with the product; they just don't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: good workout gloves
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my crossfit workouts, both to protect my hands on pull ups and also to protect my new Motiv fitness ring. I have worn them a couple of times and they work great. They are easy to put on and I am enjoying the wrist support as well, even though that is not the reason that I purchased these. The order process was easy and follow up to ensure my happiness has been topnotch.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable gloves with good wrist support.
customer_reviews.text: I was right on the cusp between a small and a medium, so I went small. When I first tried them on they were a bit tight and I debated returning them. But I wore them for a couple of workouts and they loosened up ever so slightly, making it a perfect fit. I really like these to keep the calluses off my palms when I lift, and the wrist wraps are excellent for providing support. I recommend these gloves and suggest if you’re in between sizes to go smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Globetrotter

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves for lifting
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing these workout gloves last month, I've have stopped using other ones. These are definitely dependable, comfortable, and works great for heavy lifting ... highly recommend these gloves for anyone whose lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.J

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not for me- EXCELLENT customer service !
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice but just not for what I needed them for ! If you’re doing a lot of barbell work and hands are hurting this is perfect or working with KB or DB. I got these for pull-ups and there a little too thick so holding onto the bar was near impossible after 4. I have small hands so wrapping my hands around the bar and holding on is tough enough on its own so these were just a little too thick and didn’t workout for me. I will say company is awesome though !!! I ordered the wrong size the first time and without even thinking they shipped out the write size!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Double Right Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it's my fault. These are probably my third pair. These gloves last about 3 months, going to the gym 5-6 times a week, for about 2 hours per gym visit. The latest order had two right gloves. I've been wondering why, my left hand wasn't fitting right. I finally realized I had two right gloves. I guess there wasn't enough quality assurance on this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lifting gloves
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lifting gloves. They are very comfortable to wear, the grip is very good and prevents blisters. I love the fact that they have wrist wraps (which are of a very good length.)
customer_reviews.author: LindaH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in the market for workout gloves for a long time. I read the reviews and pull the trigger on these. I’m glad I did they’re comfortable durable and these are going to last a long time I have a feeling. They don’t pinch my fingers easy on my wrist. You’re very comfortable and my hands are sweaty. Highly recommend these gloves if you were in between sizes go down one. My hands are 7 1/2 I did a small they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have very small wrists but I must have long fingers. The gloves are very uncomfortable because some of the finger bands are too long landing close to my second knuckles while others are too short and feel like they are cutting into the web of my finger where it meets my hand. The wrist support is great but the gloves fit me so poorly they just don't work for me. Otherwise, the gloves look well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves a little less than 2 month ago and they are falling apart! The wrist support stitching has fully separated. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO SANCHEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service...
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit great. 5'7, 220 guy and have small hands so got the small which works well. The wrap fir wrist goes around twice as designed and stays in place very well. My hands feel better when I'm doing shrugs now. Awesome product and they guarantee perfect fit. Received customer service email very next day backing their product which speaks volumes.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are not going to get you the same durability/flexibility as full-hand glove will. MAN, are they cool looking though! I get lots of compliments at the gym when I wear them (and I'm an ugly dude, so I know it's not ladies trying to pick me up! ). So yeah, buy for the coolness factor!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good grip for working out
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it's open on the back of the hand, more comfortable to wear. At first it took me a little getting used to the fit considering the way it fits close to my knuckles, but it did offer good protection for weightlifting. The wrist band is very good and offers very good support. Overall I'm enjoying the product, though it hasn't been long that I've had it. But would sure recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the cost
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable gloves, my only problem is that they seem to slip. When doing anything with pull ups/knee ups and such, the gloves tend to slide. I bought a size small. They are also a little bulky. Will work for starting out, but would recommend investing in better ones. These definitely stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are along with the other three sold by the company have provided me with phenomenal support for totally separate exercises. These were huge for me for many reasons, one being frequent calaces, another the fact that having clammy hands makes it difficult for myself to really push my limits in terms of weights. They are extremely comfortable and snug. I also love the camo design, as flashy as you may think it is, I think it gives them a subtle swag that I think we all like to have in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: No more wrist discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time lifting weights I used to have wrist pain/discomfort and I tried a couple of different items but none of them did the trick. As everyone out there I found the answer on Amazon, lol. These grips are fantastic! Excellent material, perfect quality, good fit, they look nice and most importantly my wrist pain is gone. I was a little shy of wearing them at my gym (feeling like a pro), but it turns out that several guys at my gym have the exact same grips :)
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to padded gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are great to use to keep your hands from getting sore gripping the barbell/dumbbell. No extra padding so you can still feel your grip on the bar. The neoprene around the fingers are starting to get a little worn but I’ve been using them about 4x a week for the past two months now so a little wear is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: I. Serna

customer_reviews.title: es at Good workout gloves
customer_reviews.text: My gym just changed to machines with hard and slick handles; as a result I had to find something with a good grip which also protected m hands. I have now used them for a couple of months and they fit the bill; good gloves at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Third Wiley

customer_reviews.title: What every lifter needs at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The wrap around the wrist gives you all the support you need, it hardly feels like you're wearing gloves, but you still get coverage exactly where you need it, the thin layer of silicone padding reduces friction and make lifting more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge S

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: The small size is a comfortable fit for my hands. I don't care for the big "Pro Fitness" on the outside but the gloves work great and relieved the pain I was feeling in my grip right away. I would recommend these for sure to others!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Great for CrossFit!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second pair of these gloves and love them. My first pair lasted about 5 months with being used 4-6 days per week for CrossFit WODs. I also would wash them every week because I sweat a lot. Grip maintained after washes up until just recently and the wrist wraps did start to tear a little bit, but still worked. I would expect this with the amount of abuse I put them through every week for 5 months. The fit is true to size when you measure your palm based on their sizing chart. Very comfortable from day one and the wrist support is awesome as well. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are great gym gloves. I ordered based on the recommended sizing. They fit great. Only negative thing is that I wear an Apple watch and depending on my hand movement the wrist strap on the glove tends to push on the crown/dial and prompts Siri.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: No more ripped hands!
customer_reviews.text: I like how much surface area of my hands are covered. I do crossfit and am always ripping my hands with basic lifts. These gloves are very comfortable and I did not RIP my hands at all during my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Holt

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff on the market
customer_reviews.text: Ok so if you’re looking for some great gear this company is a a one and done and these gloves are no exception!! The comfort is unmatched but the quality is far ahead of the competition and the lifetime warranty makes it a no brainer! The company is also very active and will answer any questions you have or fix any issues you find (good luck finding an issue) would definitely recommend Spanish ok si buscas una compañía para equipo de gym esta es la única que ocupas los productos son los mejores en la marketa y la garantia es de por vida!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great grip!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! It took some time to get use to but once you get the hang of it, your workouts are fire! The grips are the best! No blisters and the wrist guards really help stabilize you in your workout. If you wear an apple watch, just wear your sport band with it and make it looser so the wrist guards have room. Happy workout!
customer_reviews.author: Simba

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great grip
customer_reviews.text: Been doing CrossFit now for 2 months. Definitely needed a pair of grips to hit the bar with. I got these because of the price and was very pleasantly surprised at how comfortable and flexible they are. I didn't take into account that my sausage fingers. Are the measurements on the pictures I ordered a large and it fit well but it was tied around my singers. After talking to the customer support, I was sent another pair one size larger and it fit my fingers perfect. Very happy with this product and very pleased with the customer service along with it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Right for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for CrossFit and there terrible. Not flexible, no grip, and super awkward. Not meant for pull ups. I couldn’t use them. My coach said they were a terrible choice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Tandy

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great for all around gym use. They do wear a little quickly if you use them everyday however the company offers a free lifetime warranty so just a quick email and they replaced them no questions asked. Will definitely use again. Update: Wore the replacements out again, the stitching always falls apart but the company replaced them again. No questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Home owner

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me--not worth returning ($ to ship)
customer_reviews.text: This style of glove didn't work for me. I'm going back to the full coverage glove style. I was going to return it for a refund but Amazon gave me poor choices: return to Amazon locker for free but inconvenient location, or send back for $5.99. Neither are worth my time/money. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ada L. King

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my Hand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these due to the reviews that they were great, but I tried them out and it was horrible. They hurt my hand real bad and they do not have any give in them. I do not like them and meant to send them back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s such a durable product and has life time warranty on it. The company has great customer service and I appreciate that. The gloves are made so nicely because they get the job done and ur hands can still breathe and not feel like they are in a balloon. The grip side is built with solid material and overall fit is nice as it gives u the wrist support as well
customer_reviews.author: harjeet

customer_reviews.title: Iffy buy.
customer_reviews.text: They are what’s described in the photos but I just didn’t enjoy how they felt once I put them on. I have short fat fingers so I thought getting the large was the best idea but them the palm part is too big. Maybe great for someone else though.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Products and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit perfect and the feel is amazing! Cant wait to keep using them and getting them gains! Will definitely keep purchasing from pro fitness! Customer service and products are top notch! Edit: Gloves were starting to rip and the grip coming off. Reached out to support and they sent me a new pair free of charge. Best company for lifting equipment by far.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these gloves, I measured like it showed to get the correct size. Upon receiving the gloves, I found they were too big for me. I contacted the company and can I just say how very impressed I was with the customer service...they sent me another pair and I had them within just a couple of days! I have only gotten to use them once, but I love the feel and comfort. I honestly think durability wise they’re going to hold up quite well, but that’s my opinion. Time will tell. So for me...customer service rates 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these gloves for a year and they worked great. I like that they’re open on the top so my hands don’t get too hot. Also they provide great wrist support which I need when doing push ups. They recently started to rip at the seams on the underside of the glove. Since the company offers a lifetime replacement warranty I reached out and they sent me a brand new pair!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use all finger slots for more comfort
customer_reviews.text: When I initially tried on the gloves, it felt a lot smaller than I expected, even tho I did order a small. However, it worked out when I decided to just use 3 of my fingers and have my pinky finger free. The grip is a lot more comfortable for me this way!
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: These are dope!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best, if not the best lifting gloves I've ever used, and I've used a few dozen pair of gloves in my lifetime. It gives me what I'm looking for, grip and freedom. I don't like full gloves, they are stuffy and get really sweaty. I can breathe in these. Im wearing a medium sized glove, same as if I were wearing full gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McCord

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a glove. Pun intended!! But seriously. They fit perfectly. And have already saved my hands a few times!! Love the camp. They feel super high quality. And at such an affordable price!!
customer_reviews.author: jackie britton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves for the price. Grip is nice. Stitching is good. Comfortable and has good wrist support. Size is true. For women, if you are between a small and medium, go with a medium. There is no stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Josie McCalister

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these gloves for about a month now, and I don't know how I ever worked out without them! I wear them for pretty much everything I do in the gym because I don't want calluses and germs kind of freak me out (the patrons of my gym take wiping down equipment as a light suggestion). With all their use they still look pretty new and do an excellent job supporting my wrists and grip when I do heavy lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality and superb service.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love their gloves . Ever since my first pair, I haven't went back to any other kind. The price is great, and the quality is superb. I like how the glove is thin because it makes it feel like I have a good grip. Thick gloves always felt off for me when lifting, so the design is perfect. It protects my hands and supports the wrist. The folks over at ProFitness are wonderful and very customer service based. I had a issue with one of my orders and they were super quick and attentive on assuring my order would be corrected and that I was satisfied in which I definitely am. Thanks ProFitness!
customer_reviews.author: Macson

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got these and got my normal size, which was too large. I was able to make contact with the seller's customer service and was sent out a new pair in a smaller size. They fit great, and they protect my hands from the weights and getting calloused, which I am not here for.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Wortman

customer_reviews.title: Just Not For Me - Update
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a fine product, but the design just doesn't work for me. I do understand the product is supported by the company with a money back guaranty and that's great. I'm back to full gloves. Update: The company is sending full gloves free of charge - excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are super comfortable and so many people at the gym ask me where I get them from. They are very secure around the wrist and provides great support. The grip is awesome in the front and allows me to hold weights easily. I have kid size hands and the palm section is a little big but I wrap the wrist part a little higher on my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Aletha

customer_reviews.title: These wraps worked great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wraps a few days ago and was finally able to use these on a WOD today with Toes to Bar. I got to say the wraps felt pretty good and I really like the fact that if you are starting to fatigue on the bar and slip, these wraps instead of tear at the connection point, breakaway due to the velcro straps. Super easy to adjust and get back on the bar to crank out some more reps! Great design and have been recommending them to my fellow gym rats!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Cool gloves
customer_reviews.text: I like these gloves for weight lifting for sure, they provide great grip comfort.. but I often jump into push ups and dips and because of the wrist straps I can’t bend my wrists which makes those moves too hard.. so It’s just an adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Previous model is much better...
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair. Four are of the previous model - with thumb holes and a larger palm grip. This version is tighter in the fingers. I won't be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support on the wrist
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my boyfriend as a gift since he is into weightlifting, I worry about his wrist and calluses he gets on his palms. So far he enjoys using them, especially the fact that it supports his wrist . He can now push more weights without any fear of injury, so safe to say it's serving a really good purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Atisha Del

customer_reviews.title: 👍😊
customer_reviews.text: Really nice coverage of my hand. The grip on pull up bars is awesome. The added wrist wrap provides much needed wrist support for me. Can't beat the price. Make sure to measure your hand as recommend to get proper size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and functional
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are super comfortable and they have improved my grip immensely. They also protect my hands so they don’t hurt after every workout! I haven’t had them long enough to say anything about durability, but I’m glad they are washable!
customer_reviews.author: Peg5678

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave these 4 stars was the silicon grip on the palm wears down after a few months. Other than that it's a great glove. Would be nice if there was a thumb strap to help keep the glove centered on my palm though.
customer_reviews.author: Graewolf

customer_reviews.title: Best Gloves for Crossfit!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these gloves!! I never do CrossFit without them. I love how they give wrist support and that they are very reliable. It doesn’t slide on my hands or cause any issues while I’m working out. It also keeps my hands from getting calluses or blisters. I’ve been using them for almost a year now and they are still going strong. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Leana

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my girlfriend. The quality of the item is good. She really likes them. The only issue she had was that the finger loops were too tight between the knuckles. I used the chart when ordering and went with a Small, but should have ordered a Medium for some extra room. She ordered a Medium pair and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support and overall excelent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product quality, it seems very durable (as much as you can expect from these kind of gear), and the gripping is great. I just had an issue with the sizing, but the seller changed my product for free. The sizing chart was pretty accurate but my palms are kinda broader and shorter. Excelent customer support. Recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like these they are great to lift in and kB swing without ripping the flesh of your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Otrain

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size SM based on the size of my hand but was concerned they could be too small. Guess what happened? Yes, too small. I contacted totalprofitness and they quickly sent me another pair at no cost. The size small is just a little big around one of my fingers but the grasp is great. I have used just a handful of times so I can't say about durability yet. It is worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for WODs.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have had these gloves for a little over a month. Awesome purchase. I will see if they stand the test of time. Initial assessment is that that are durable and fit well. Specially designed for WODs.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product material not so good and it can withstand at least 6 months of long hard work outs
customer_reviews.text: Have been using them for about 7-8 months 5 days a week of intense work outs in the gym and they’re starting to loose their rubber line grip pattern inside your hand at month 6 now its time to get new ones there great but the material is way too stretchy for my taste since I like to have a good tight wrist support and after a while the elasticity wares off and stays stretched out great product just the material is not good enough for long term hard work outs still 4 stars. I used them for heavy lifting
customer_reviews.author: Michael Solano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten big on incorporating weights and TRX into my workouts, but don’t like the feeling of calluses on my hands. These game highly recommended by one of my favorite Youtubers, and I love them! They’re not constricting at all, and I love how breathable they are. I have an average sized palm for a female, but have narrow fingers. My ring size is 4.5-6, so I was concerned about the fit, but they’re perfect! I bought size small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material. I ordered the size I wear in gloves at the hospital. Big mistake. Way too tight around the fingers. Should’ve ordered a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kortney F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I go to the gym almost daily and these provide great protection for your hands while allowing plenty of airflow. They lasted a few months and when I needed a pair replaced the customer service was very responsive and sent me a replacement pair immediately. Definitely recommend for anyone looking for a solid pair of workout gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dixon

customer_reviews.title: good wrist support, horrible grip
customer_reviews.text: I am a female gym enthusiast. I lift approximately 40-70 lbs depending on the muscle group I'm working. These gloves were meant to help with my wrists and tough hands. They did support my wrists very well and comfortably. They were also designed nicely to keep my hands from getting too hot. But the grip is really horrible. I had to double my grip strength. When I used battle ropes, I couldn't even hold onto the rope. Absolutely not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amos Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend long term
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels great, but after a few weeks it started to tear where the strap starts going around your wrist. So now I have a huge hole and was hoping not to have a reoccurrence of my last pair. I was sadly mistaken.
customer_reviews.author: Jfrick

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: I use these for pullups and deadlifting before I have to use straps. They let your hands breath and do the job very well; they also seem like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: big dog

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to assist with my weight training and crossfit so that my hands aren't so torn up by the end of the day. Half the cost of the competitors, but equally nice in quality and the wrist strap is comfortable and easy to put on/take off. Received a size too small and the company was very quick to respond and ensured I was completely satisfied with their "Happiness Guarantee" by sending a larger size. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These gloves come with a lifetime warranty and ProFitness/NewAge Supply stand by that. I use these gloves 5-6 days a week for strength training. Any time I have an issue with these gloves (i.e. threads unravel), there is never an issue with getting a replacement. They have also been very informative about upgrades to the products to make them more durable. I will continue to use their products during future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Buster Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Great wraps at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: These wrist wraps fit my tiny hands well. They grip (nearly every piece of gym equipment/bar/kettlebells/dumbbells/etc) well and stabilize my wrists on those thrusters and shoulder presses. I use them for nearly every workout. I highly recommend them! I’ve used the Woddies brand and did not like them. These were far superior at a much bett
customer_reviews.author: mamatee19

customer_reviews.title: Used them twice and now useless for pullups
customer_reviews.text: Stretched and too big now. Used them twice and now useless for pullups. :(
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: 110% Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves because I was getting nasty calluses and my wrists couldn't keep up with my weight, and wow have these gloves helped! Whenever you order a product they also send you a free pair of wrist wraps and knee sleeves, which is a great bonus! Great quality, fast shipping, and friendly workers. I can't say enough about this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know about it..?
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea ,but they are some improvements to be made the rings fingers size Feels uneven in all fingers and too tight in other . And the wrist Velcro needs to be place batter My wrist is the one of the smallest I’m a girl and it barely reaches and there is a lot of Velcro uncover that it gets hooked on my clothes..I mess up one of my favorite suits already😕
customer_reviews.author: alexis freeman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing non-leather gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves specifically because I wanted an alternative for leather gloves and I couldn't be happier. The quality of the glove is very good, it is confortable to wear, and most importantly, it doesn't slip while I'm hanging on the bar (doing toes-to-bar, pull ups, etc.) These gloves have a great grip. Another thing that is very nice is the wrist support, which also is excellent. To sum it up: you can't go wrong with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Melibeu

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Best workout gloves ever. With this gloves I'm able to workout longer than before. I average about 3- 4 hrs Very satisfied with this product, wish i bought it long time ago. No more calluses😬
customer_reviews.author: miguel a.

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just right for me and they do their job when weight training. Unfortunately the stitches holding the velcro fasteners came undone. For all the stress that those components of the gloves are known to experience - lots of ripping the straps off - I would've expected much better stitching at those critical points. I don't recommend this product for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: JewelingGrace

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Received the item earlier than expects with priority shipping. I love these gloves. Fit as expected and very comfortable to used. This will be my second pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional product, exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: First off, customer service was amazing!! Like above and beyond! I ordered the wrong size (100% my error) and the everything was fixed within 2 days. I've only used them to work out once so far but they do what they are supposed to. They help with overall grip and stop you from getting calluses. I didn't have any issue with sweating or chaffing either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves! I used them every time I work out. I really like the wrist support and that my hands are able to breathe. Not very good on pullups though. Which is fine because these gloves make sure I don't rip my hands while lifting.. so it wont hurt as bad when using my bare hands on pull ups.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great workout gloves, even better customer service from the vendor.
customer_reviews.text: I workout 4-5 days a week and these gloves are great. The only issue I had was one of them started to tear after using for several months consistently. I contacted ProFitness about getting a warranty replacement and the Customer Service Manager Benj responded promptly and sent the replacement right away. I received it a few days later. That's what I call World Class Customer Service. Thanks so much Benj!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C

customer_reviews.title: but these gloves are the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have been lifting weights for years and have tried all kinds of gloves, but these gloves are the best on the market. I love that you can put ur fingers in them and then you wrap the top wrap around your wrist to your liking. The grip on these gloves is absolutely amazing and highly recommend if you pump iron. Thanks ProFitness
customer_reviews.author: L. H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip!
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves for crossfit and I love them! I have excellent grip on the barbells and it has improved my grip for pullups. The only negative I can think of is that it doesn't protect the base of my thumbs which become tender after barbell exercises, but the gloves that do cover that area don't perform as well as these so I'm still very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisseer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great workout gloves, very good material, provides excellent support to my wrists. I had ordered a pair a few months ago but I lost one glove so I ordered them again because they are excellent. FYI, These run small, I have a tiny hand but the XS didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: MTB

product_meta.title: ProFitness Cross Training Gloves Non-Slip Palm Silicone Weight Lifting Glove to Avoid Calluses | Perfect for WODs & Weightlifting | with Wrist Wrap Support, Ideal for Both Men & Women
feature_bullets: ENHANCED GRIP – The flexible neoprene gym gloves feature reinforced silicone-padded palms to improve your grip strength and control over lifting dumbbells, barbells and free weights.
REDUCE INJURIES – The best Crossfit gloves for WODs, weightlifting and overall fitness, the breathable neoprene helps reduce sweat to keep hands dry and free from calluses and sores.

60 DAY SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – ProFitness workout gloves are designed to be functional, comfortable and easier on your hands. If you don’t find all three attributes fit our gloves, return them within 60 days for a full refund.
STABILITY WRAPS – Weightlifting gloves features an attached, adjustable wrist wrap to improve comfort and reduce hand tension while doing curls, chin ups, pull ups or other bodybuilding exercises.
VERSATILE USES – Great for standard cross training and powerlifting workouts, these Gym Workout Gloves are also great for home gyms, rope climbing, and other indoor/outdoor exercises.
